name: PixelFem #32 - Franceska Mann
description:
In most contexts, the words killer and ballerina don’t often go together. One word produces images of violence and bloodshed, while the other is consistent with beauty and grace. In the situation of Franceska Mann, these two words are now synonymous with the same person. Her story unfolds during WWII, as a powerful story of bravery, determination and unwillingness to surrender in the face of hate and tyranny.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
